text:
Kelly Adam Asbury (January 15, 1960 – June 26, 2020) was an American animated movie director, screenwriter, voice actor, published children's book author/illustrator, and non-fiction author. He was best known for directing animated movies including ', "Shrek 2" and "Gnomeo & Juliet". He was born in Beaumont, Texas.
Asbury died from stage 4 abdominal cancer at his home in Encino, California on June 26, 2020 at the age of 60.
